oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Painting on burlap
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Painting, depicting a Civil War scene, on burlap with the U. S. flag in the background. A cannon can be seen to the left of the canvas. Injured soldiers are shown in the foreground. The location portrayed in the painting is the Haven Family farm in; Ooltewah, Tennessee. The farm is located on the Bradley County line. The owner stated that a cemetery is located just to the right of the area shown in the painting.
